# Termokiss Website - GitHub Copilot Instructions

This is a Next.js 14+ website for Termokiss, a community-run center in Prishtina, Kosovo, featuring a Bauhaus-inspired black and white design aesthetic.

## Project Structure
- Next.js 14+ with App Router (NO TypeScript, NO ESLint)
- Tailwind CSS for all styling
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Strict black and white color palette

## Design Principles
- Bauhaus aesthetic with geometric shapes
- All uppercase typography with wide letter-spacing
- Heavy font weights (700-900)
- 4px black borders on all elements
- Grayscale filter on all images
- Grid-based layouts

## Development Guidelines
- Use Inter font family throughout
- Implement hover effects with scale transforms
- Follow numbered section hierarchy (01, 02, 03...)
- Maintain high contrast black/white alternation
- Ensure mobile responsiveness

## Getting Started
1. Install dependencies: `npm install`
2. Run development server: `npm run dev`
3. Open http://localhost:3000 in your browser
4. Build for production: `npm run build`
